mapper.insert:
insert all into PATIENT (PAT_ID, MEM_ID, ANIMAL_CD, CLI_CD, PAT_NAME, PAT_BIRTH, PAT_GENDER, PAT_WEIGHT, PAT_ADD1, PAT_ADD2, PAT_CHIP, PAT_REGNM, PAT_ABANDON, PREGNANT_CHECK, PAT_NEW,PAT_MEMO,PAT_PROFILE)
VALUES (PATIENT_SEQ.nextval, MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{animalCd},#{cliCd},#{patName},#{patBirth},#{patGender}, #{patWeight},#{patAdd1},#{patAdd2},#{patChip},#{patRegnm},#{patAbandon}, #{pregnantCheck},#{patNew},#{patMemo},#{patProfile})
into MEMBER (MEM_ID, cli_cd, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_AGREE) values (MEMBER_SEQ.nextval,#{cliCd},#{memName},#{memTel},'Y') select * from dual
mapper.select: select a.*, b.emp_name from pra_room a join EMPLOYEES b on a.emp_id = b.EMP_ID order by PRA_ROOM_NM asc
SELECT a.PAT_ID ,a.PAT_NAME ,b.MEM_TEL FROM PATIENT a inner join member b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id WHERE PAT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{value} || '%'

select a.PAT_ID, a.MEM_ID, a.ANIMAL_CD, a.CLI_CD, a.PAT_NAME, a.PAT_BIRTH, a.PAT_GENDER, a.PAT_WEIGHT, a.PAT_ADD1, a.PAT_ADD2, a.PAT_CHIP, a.PAT_REGNM, a.PAT_ABANDON, a.PREGNANT_CHECK, a.PAT_NEW, a.PAT_MEMO, a.PAT_PROFILE, b.CLI_CD, b.MEM_NAME, b.MEM_TEL, b.MEM_AGREE from patient a inner join member b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id where a.PAT_NAME = #{patName} and b.mem_tel = #{memTel}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RECEIPT ( REC_NM, PAT_ID, PRA_ROOM_NM, ANIMAL_CD, REC_DATE, REC_PURPOSE,REC_STATUS ) SELECT RECEIPT_SEQ.nextval, #{patId}, #{praRoomNm}, #{animalCd}, sysdate, #{recPurpose},'진료대기' from dual
where not exists ( select pat_id from receipt where pat_id = #{patId} and rec_status like '진료' || '%' )
mapper.select: select b.pat_name, a.PRA_ROOM_NM, a.rec_status, a.rec_nm, a.pat_id ,b.PAT_GENDER,b.PAT_BIRTH,b.PAT_MEMO from receipt a left join PATIENT b on b.pat_id=a.pat_id where a.PRA_ROOM_NM = #{praRoomNm} and a.REC_STATUS = '진료대기' or a.PRA_ROOM_NM = #{praRoomNm} and a.REC_STATUS = '진료중' order by a.REC_STATUS DESC, a.rec_nm asc

select c.pat_name, c.pat_id, d.rec_status, d.pra_cd,c.PAT_GENDER,c.PAT_BIRTH,c.PAT_MEMO from patient c join ( select b.rec_status, b.rec_nm, b.pat_id, a.pra_cd, a.PRA_STATUS from pra a, receipt b where b.rec_nm = a.rec_nm and (rec_status = '수납대기' or rec_status = '입원대기') and pra_status='1')d on c.pat_id = d.pat_id order by d.pra_cd asc

select e.pat_name, e.pat_id, f.rec_status, f.pay_nm, f.pra_cd from patient e join (select c.rec_nm, c.rec_status, d.pat_id, d.pay_nm,d.pra_cd from receipt c join (select b.pra_cd, b.pat_id, b.rec_nm, a.PAY_NM from payment a join pra b on b.pra_cd = a.pra_cd where TO_CHAR(a.pay_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'))d on d.rec_nm = c.rec_nm)f on f.pat_id= e.pat_id where f.rec_status = '수납완료' order by f.pay_nm desc
mapper.update: UPDATE RECEIPT SET REC_STATUS = '수납완료' where rec_nm = (select rec_nm from pra where pra_cd =#{praCd})
mapper.select: select c.*, TO_CHAR(c.pra_date,'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "')as pra_date2 from patient a inner join member b on b.mem_id = a.mem_id join PRA c on a.pat_id = c.PAT_ID where a.PAT_NAME = #{patName} and b.mem_tel = #{memTel} order by c.PRA_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE patient SET PAT_PROFILE = #{patProfile} WHERE pat_id = #{patId}
UPDATE patient SET PAT_ADD1=#{patAdd1}, PAT_ADD2=#{patAdd2},PREGNANT_CHECK=#{pregnantCheck} WHERE pat_id = #{patId}
update member set mem_name=#{memName}, mem_tel = #{memTel} where mem_id = (select mem_id from patient where pat_id = #{patId})
mapper.select: select a.* , b.* from PATIENT a join MEMBER b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id where a.pat_Id = #{patId}
select a.*, b.* from receipt a join patient b on b.pat_id = a.pat_id where a.pat_id = #{patId}

select TO_CHAR(vaccine_date,'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "')as pra_date2,vaccine.* from vaccine where pat_id = (select a.PAT_ID from patient a inner join member b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id where a.PAT_NAME = #{patName} and b.mem_tel = #{memTel}) order by vaccine_date desc
select * from ward
select cage_nm from cage where WARD_NM = #{wardNm} and CAGE_STATUS = '0' order by cage_nm asc
mapper.insert: insert into stay (ST_CD, PRA_CD, PAT_ID, CAGE_NM, CLI_CD, EMP_ID, ST_START_DATE, ST_STATE,ST_DAYS, ST_TOTAL, ST_FOOD_TOTAL,ST_FOOD_NUM) values ('a'||STAY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{praCd}, #{patId}, #{cageNm}, 'h001', #{empId}, sysdate, 'Y','0','0','0','0')
mapper.select: select count(*) from stay where pra_cd = #{praCd} and st_state='Y'
select a.PRE_IN_TOTAL, a.TEST_TOTAL, a.PRA_PRICE, b.ST_FOOD_TOTAL, b.ST_STATE from pra a LEFT OUTER JOIN stay b on a.pat_id = b.pat_id where a.pat_id = #{patId}
select b.pra_cd from patient a, pra b where a.pat_id = b.pat_id and b.pat_id = #{patId} and b.pra_status = '1'

select d.TEST_CD, d.TEST_TYPE, d.TEST_NAME, d.TEST_PRICE from test d join (select c.TD_NM, c.PRA_CD, c.TEST_CD, c.TD_DATE from TEST_DETAIL c where c.pra_cd = (select b.pra_cd from patient a, pra b where a.pat_id = b.pat_id and b.pat_id =#{patId} and b.pra_status = '1'))e on e.test_cd = d.test_cd
mapper.update: update pra set PRA_STATUS = '2' where pra_cd = #{patCd}
mapper.select: SELECT A.RES_NM, A.EMP_ID, A.PAT_ID, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as resStartDate, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as resTime, B.PAT_NAME, C.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PAT_ID = B.PAT_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID where TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.res_memo is null order by resTime asc
mapper.update: insert into PAYMENT (PAY_NM, PRA_CD, PRA_TOTAL, PAY_CASH, PAY_CARD, PAY_TOTAL, PAY_DATE) values(PAYMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{praCd}, #{praTotal}, #{payCash}, #{payCard}, #{payTotal},sysdate)
update RESERVATION SET res_memo = '1' where res_nm = #{resNm}
mapper.select: select b.EMP_PROFILE,b.EMP_JOB, a.PAT_ID, a.EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(a.PAT_MEMO_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:SS') as memoDate,TO_CHAR(a.PAT_MEMO_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') as memoDate2 ,a.PAT_MEMO_CON, b.emp_name from pat_memo a, EMPLOYEES b where b.emp_id = a.emp_id and pat_id =#{patId}order by memoDate asc
select COUNT(*) as cnt from appreceipt where WONMU_CHECK = 'N'

select c.mem_tel, d.pat_name, d.pat_id,d.pat_gender, d.pat_memo,d.wonmu_check from member c inner join ( select a.pat_name,b.pat_id, a.mem_id,a.pat_gender, a.pat_memo, b.wonmu_check from appreceipt b inner join patient a on a.pat_id= b.pat_id where b.wonmu_check = 'N')d on c.mem_id = d.mem_id
mapper.update: update appreceipt set WONMU_CHECK = 'Y' where pat_id = #{patId}
mapper.select: select b.* from test b join test_detail c on b.test_cd = c.test_cd where c.pra_cd = #{praCd}

select b.drug_nm, a.ITEM_NAME, b.pre_in_amount, b.pre_in_cnt, b.pre_in_days, a.DRUG_PRICE from drug a join ( select DRUG_NM,PRE_IN_AMOUNT,PRE_IN_CNT,PRE_IN_PRICE,PRE_IN_DAYS from PRE_IN where pra_cd = #{praCd})b on a.DRUG_NM = b.DRUG_NM
select a.PRA_PRICE, a.PAT_ID, a.PRA_DATE, b.pat_name from pra a join patient b on a.pat_id = b.pat_id where a.pra_cd = #{praCd}
select a.* from VACCINE_DETAIL a join (select VD_NM from VACCINE where PRA_CD =#{praCd})b on a.VD_NM = b.VD_NM

select e.food_name, ( sum(e.food_price) / COUNT(e.food_name))as food_price,COUNT(e.food_name) AS food_nm , sum(e.food_price) as total from FOOD e join(select c.food_dt_nm, c.FOOD_NM from FOOD_DETAIL c join (select b.ST_TOTAL, b.ST_FOOD_TOTAl, b.ST_CD from pra a join stay b on a.pat_id = b.pat_id where a.pra_cd =#{praCd})d on c.st_cd = d.st_cd)f on e.food_nm = f.food_nm group by e.food_name order by e.food_name asc

select sum( NVL(st_total,0) + NVL(PRE_IN_TOTAL,0)+ NVL(TEST_TOTAL,0)+ NVL(PRA_PRICE,0)+ NVL(VACCINE_PRICE,0)) as total from ( select a.st_total, b.* from stay a join ( select PRE_IN_TOTAL, TEST_TOTAL, PRA_PRICE, VACCINE_PRICE, pat_id from pra where pra_cd =#{praCd})b on a.pat_id = b.pat_id)
select sum ( NVL(PRE_IN_TOTAL,0)+ NVL(TEST_TOTAL,0)+ NVL(PRA_PRICE,0)+ NVL(VACCINE_PRICE,0) ) from pra where pra_cd = #{praCd}
select a.pat_id from patient a join member b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id where b.mem_tel =#{memTel} and a.pat_name=#{patName}

select ST_FOOD_TOTAl, st_total,test_total,PRE_IN_TOTAL,PRA_PRICE,VACCINE_PRICE from ( select a.st_total,a.ST_FOOD_TOTAL, b.* from stay a join ( select PRE_IN_TOTAL, TEST_TOTAL, PRA_PRICE, VACCINE_PRICE, pat_id from pra where pra_cd = #{praCd})b on a.pat_id = b.pat_id)
mapper.update: update receipt set rec_status = '입원중' where rec_nm = ( select rec_nm from pra where pra_cd = #{praCd})
update cage set CAGE_STATUS = '1' where cage_nm = #{cageNm}
mapper.select: select c.ITEM_NAME , d.* from drug c join (select b.* from pra a join pre_out b on a.pra_cd = b.pra_cd and b.pra_cd = #{praCd})d on c.drug_nm = d.drug_nm

select f.*, e.emp_name from EMPLOYEES e join ( select c.mem_tel, c.mem_name,d.pat_id,d.pat_name, d.ANIMAL_CD, d.pat_gender, d.pat_weight, trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate, d.pat_birth))as pat_birth,d.emp_id from member c join ( select b.pat_id,b.pat_name, b.ANIMAL_CD, b.pat_gender, b.pat_birth, b.pat_weight, b.mem_id, a.emp_id from pra a join patient b on b.pat_id = a.pat_id where a.pra_cd = #{praCd})d on d.mem_id = c.mem_id)f on e.emp_id = f.emp_id
select count(*) from pra a join pre_out b on a.pra_cd = b.pra_cd and b.pra_cd = #{praCd}

select b.rec_nm, a.pra_cd, TO_CHAR(a.pra_date,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"')as pra_date2,TO_CHAR(a.pra_date,'YYYY"."MM"."DD"."')as pra_date3, a.PRA_WEIGHT from pra a join (select rec_nm from receipt where pat_id = (select x.pat_id from patient x join member z on x.mem_id = z.mem_id where z.mem_tel =#{memTel} and x.pat_name=#{patName}) )b on b.rec_nm = a.rec_nm order by b.rec_nm asc

select a.mem_name, b.pat_add1, b.pat_add2, b.mem_id,b.animal_cd, b.pat_name, b.pat_birth as pat_birth2, b.pat_gender from member a join (select pat_add1, pat_add2, mem_id, animal_cd, pat_name, pat_birth, pat_gender from patient where pat_id = (select pat_id from pra where pra_cd = #{praCd}))b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id
select a.DIS_NAME, b.* from DIS_DETAIL a join (select a.* , b.pra_date from DOC_FILE a join pra b on a.pra_cd = b.pra_cd where a.PRA_CD = #{praCd} )b on b.pra_cd = a.pra_cd
select a.EMP_NAME from EMPLOYEES a join PRA_ROOM b on a.emp_id = b.emp_id order by b.PRA_ROOM_NM asc
